ALLOWED_MIME_TYPES.description: An array of accepted MIME types.

CHECKSUM_ALGORITHM.description: The algorithm used for file naming and validating file integrity.

JWT_EXPIRATION_MS.description: The time in milliseconds before a JWT expires.

LOG_ENTIRES_PER_PAGE.description: The number of log entries per page.

MAX_COMMENT_LINES.description: The maximum number of line breaks allowed in the comment body.

MAX_FILE_COUNT.description: The maximum number of files that can be uploaded with a post.

MAX_FILE_SIZE.description: The maximum file size in bytes.

MAX_NON_FILE_FIELDS.description: The maximum number of non-file fields attached to the upload form.

MAX_PART_COUNT.description: The maximum number of parts in a multipart upload.

MAX_POST_BODY_LENGTH.description: The maximum number of characters allowed in a post body.

MAX_THREAD_COUNT.description: The maximum number of threads allowed on a board before trimming.

MAX_THUMBNAIL_HEIGHT.description: The maximum thumbnail height for refitting.

MAX_THUMBNAIL_WIDTH.description: The maximum thumbnail width for refitting.

RECENT_POSTS_COUNT.description: The number of recent posts to track.

S3_ENCRYPTION.description: The encryption algorithm to use with S3.

SCAN_KEYS_COUNT.description: The number passed to the COUNT option of the Redis SCAN command.

SERVER_PORT.description: Port on which the server listens for connections.

SIMPLE_ENCRYPTION_KEY.description: Simple, non-secure encryption key used to convert various strings (e.g., IP addresses) to hashes for storage in Redis.

THREADS_PER_PAGE.description: The number of threads per index page.

THREAD_TAIL_COUNT.description: The number of thread tail posts to show on an index page.

USER_ID_LENGTH.description: The length of each generated user ID.
